TopicTitle: How to post pictures on the forums.

Articles.Content: So I am currently doing a realistic duna mission, which I will be posting on the forums. What I am wondering is how do you post pictures without imgur?
You can use Photobucket, or other free picture hosting websites. Also, this belongs in Kerbal Network.

Tinypic, imageshack...

google for 'free image hosting'

What's wrong with imgur, by the way?
